title: Bloodborne (Hunter gangplank)
body: Any ideas to share? I think my ideas feel too bland XD.

replies.body:
Pirate Gangplank (Software Pirate). 

Passive applies 'Leeches' to enemies so he can download stuff faster.

Q fires floppy disks because you can probably get a million of those for free.

W he eats a dorito or something.

E he 'Seeds' for all his allies, buffing them

R he rains down free CD keys for everyone? 

[Professional quality drawing of him (I'm really bored)](http://i.imgur.com/bQ1vfIq.jpg)

> [{quoted}](name=canpan14,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=d06zdGU0,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-25T13:29:33.457+0000)

Please keep your ideas to your own board o-o. I am not angry but this was to improve on the idea at hand not post another.
Sorry about that! You said 'any ideas to share?' so i was just messing around (was bored). My mistake =)
